mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "secKill.secKilledId", s.name as "secKill.name", s.number as "secKill.number", s.start_time as "secKill.startTime", s.end_time as "secKill.endTime", s.create_time as "secKill.createTime" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{secKillId}
